summary: M'zin Rourken is a mer, apparently half a dwemer and half a chimer.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Hello, this new follower is in the testing stage.
It was created in CK, tested in game and checked with TES5Edit.
There is still much work ahead. Sorry for my english!

I have fascination with ancient or disappeared cultures, in this case the Dwemer.
That's why I decided to create a follower to accompany me on the expeditions to the Dwemer ruins.
Probably she should be a ghost, who does not interfere in fights, but who teaches me about her mysteries and knowledge.[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/aPsF9Zc.jpg[/img]


[size=3][u][b]History:
[/b][/u][/size]
[size=3][size=3]M'zin Rourken is a mer, apparently half a dwemer and half a chimer.
[/size]When she was very young, a little girl, her parents sent them to Vollenfel, as protection before the beginning
of the First Council War.
During the trip her guards disappeared mysteriously and she continued her journey alone, until she found
a caravan. A young Breton woman took pity on her and adopted her.
He lived for many years in a coastal city.
But after the death of her adoptive mother, whom she loved and respected, she decided to travel through
the known world in search of her history.

In her memories, she believes that she is the result of the union of Indoril Nerevar and one of the daughters
of King Dumac. Which would make her a Dwemer-Chimer princess.
After that idea, he deepened his studies of magic, which began with his adoptive mother and learned many
languages ​​and forms of writing.
[/size][size=3]
At the time of the civil war in Skyrim, she is studying restoration with Danica Pure Spring in the city of Whiterun.[/size]


[u][b]Requeriments: [/b][/u]

[i][b]Nousershere Ear :[/b][/i]

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21459

[i][b]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full :[/b][/i]

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168

[u][b]Specs :[/b][/u]

* Vanilla Follower.
* You can use your favorite texture pack, she will adapt very well.
* This mod run over all DLC and no need another mod.
* She is a destruction mage not overpowered.
* She support Light Armor and Sneak.
* Level with player from 15 to 150.[size=2]
* [/size][size=2]She lives in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.[/size]
author: damelamochi
